mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM COUPON WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}

SELECT COUPON_NO, COUPON_NM, (DISCOUNT_PER *100) DISCOUNT, PROVIDE_DT, EXPIRE_DT, CS.COU_STATUS_CD, CS.COU_STATUS_NM, M.MEMBER_NO, M.MEMBER_SERVICE FROM COUPON C JOIN COUPON_STATUS CS ON(CS.COU_STATUS_CD = C.COU_STATUS_CD) JOIN MEMBER M ON (C.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} ORDER BY COUPON_NO DESC

SELECT PRODUCT_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_SERVICE, PRODUCT_NM, PRODUCT_PRICE, PRODUCT_CD, PRODUCT_IMG_NO, PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL FROM "LIKE" LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT USING(PRODUCT_NO) LEFT JOIN PRODUCT_IMG USING(PRODUCT_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo}
SELECT MEMBER_PW FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND MEMBER_SERVICE IS NULL

SELECT ORD.ORDER_NO, ORD.PRODUCT_NO, PU.TOTAL_PRICE, PRODUCT_AMOUNT, ORD.MEMBER_NO, ORD.PURCHASE_NO, ORDER_OPTION, M.MEMBER_SERVICE, PRODUCT_NM, PU.PRODUCT_CD, REFUND_YN, PAYMENT_DT, PU.PRODUCT_CD, PAYMENT_STATUS , PRODUCT_IMG_PATH, PRODUCT_IMG_NAME, PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL FROM "ORDER" ORD JOIN MEMBER M ON(ORD.MEMBER_NO=M.MEMBER_NO ) JOIN ORDER_OPTION OO ON(OO.ORDER_NO = ORD.ORDER_NO) JOIN PRODUCT PR ON(PR.PRODUCT_NO = ORD.PRODUCT_NO) JOIN PURCHASE PU ON(PU.PURCHASE_NO = ORD.PURCHASE_NO) JOIN PRODUCT_IMG PIMG ON(PIMG.PRODUCT_NO = ORD.PRODUCT_NO) WHERE ORD.MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND PRODUCT_IMG_LEVEL = 0 AND PR.PRODUCT_CD = 1 AND PU.REFUND_YN = 'N'
